HTML

HTML doesn't seem to be to complex and if you do run into any problems you should be able to solve them with a simple google search. I plan to share what I learn about html here along with links and other helpful resources.

An important thing to keep in mind when creatng a website is where to get images for your site. I stumbled upon a site called Public Domain Vectors. This links to a SVG generator which creates random SVG images for your website. Example:

A resume site built mainly with html from a Treehouse tutorial.



Links:SVG Image Generator
